dev/lsf/util/backtrace.hpp

00001 // File:        backtrace.hpp
00002 // Description: ---
00003 // Notes:       ---
00004 // Author:      leoxiang <leoxiang727@qq.com>
00005 // Revision:    2015-06-15 by leoxiang
00006 
00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include <execinfo.h>
00010 #include <cxxabi.h>
00011 #include <exception>
00012 #include <string>
00013 #include "lsf/basic/singleton.hpp"
00014 #include "lsf/util/log.hpp"
00015 
00016 namespace lsf {
00017 namespace util {
00018 
00019 class Backtrace : public lsf::basic::Singleton<Backtrace> {
00020 public:
00021     const static int MAX_STACK_SIZE = 20;
00022 
00023 public:
00024     std::string ToString(int count = MAX_STACK_SIZE) const {
00025         std::string content;
00026         content.clear();
00027         count++;
00028 
00029         // check input
00030         if (count > MAX_STACK_SIZE) count = MAX_STACK_SIZE;
00031 
00032         // get stack
00033         void* array[MAX_STACK_SIZE];
00034         int size = ::backtrace(array, count);
00035         char ** messages = ::backtrace_symbols(array, size);
00036 
00037         // compose string
00038         for (int i = 1; i < size; ++i) {
00039             char* message = messages[i];
00040             std::string tmp(message);
00041 
00042             // demangle
00043             size_t begin_name = tmp.find_first_of('(');
00044             size_t end_name = tmp.find_first_of('+');
00045             if (begin_name != std::string::npos && end_name != std::string::npos && begin_name < end_name) {
00046                 int status;
00047                 message[end_name++] = '\0';
00048                 message[begin_name++] = '\0';
00049                 char* realname = ::abi::__cxa_demangle(message + begin_name, nullptr, nullptr, &status);
00050                 if (status == 0) {
00051                     tmp.clear();
00052                     tmp.append(message).append(1, '(').append(realname).append(1, '+').append(message + end_name);
00053                     free(realname);
00054                 }
00055             }
00056 
00057             // append
00058             content.append(tmp);
00059             if (i != size - 1) content.append("\n");
00060         }
00061 
00062         return content;
00063     }
00064 };
00065 
00066 }  // end of namespace util
00067 }  // end of namespace lsf
00068
